title:
BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel W/ Cover, 4.2 ft. x 4 ft. x 4.4 ft, indoors and outdoors,  galvanized metal iron thick wire tube fences, rust-resistance, no sharp edges, waterproof cover,
protect dog from the hot sun,  small and large size available, also for: chicken, rabbit, duck.
descriptions: Introducing the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover! This top-of-the-line pet enclosure is perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, providing a safe and secure space for your furry friends. Made with galvanized metal iron, this kennel is rust-resistant and features a paint-coated finish with no sharp edges, ensuring the safety of your pets. The 210D oxford cloth cover is waterproof, windproof, and provides essential sun protection, making it ideal for hot summer days. With options available in both small and large sizes, this versatile kennel is suitable for dogs, chickens, rabbits, and ducks. The easy assembly and solid latching swing gate make this kennel a must-have for pet owners. Don't wait, give your pets the space they deserve with the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover!

The 210D oxford cloth cover provides windproof, weatherproof, and sunshade protection, keeping your furry friends safe from the elements. With easy assembly and available in both small and large sizes, this playpen is a must-have for any pet owner. Give your pets the space and security they deserve with the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover!
